summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5566 for the improvement of 38th Avenue West, from Montavista Place to the north line of Block 9, Briarcliff Addition; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 72550, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
